properties.title: Install Beverly as a Karaf feature
properties.author: A. Soroka

section.name: Install Beverly as a Karaf feature
section.p:
First make the Beverly feature descriptor (which comes in the source as features.xml) available to Karaf, then install the feature. We will assume that your unpacked source is at [BEVERLY_SOURCE]. Then your Karaf interaction would look like:
karaf> features:addurl [BEVERLY_SOURCE]/features.xml karaf> features:install repository-indexing
